title: Fail to Gold Promos 2 times
body:
As you can read the thread heading says everything,

I just wated to be Gold please some 1 help me currently I am S1 just Soloing as I am never gold before and I know on 7th Dec rank will be reset but I still want to achieve :/ can any one carry me please its hard and past 8 games i am playing terrible ( way to TILTED) please help {{item:3070}}
